vocabinfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, first mentioned at Num.31.8
§ Rekem = "variegation"
n pr m 1) one of the 5 kings of Midian killed by the Israelites
2) one of the 4 sons of Hebron and the father of Shammai
3) a Manassite, son of Machir by Maachah his wife
n pr loc
4) a town in Benjamin; site unknown
vocabinfos._es_Definition: (a)   ciudad; Benjamín; (b)   rey de Madián; (c)   descendiente de Caleb; tribu de Judá; (d)   hijo de Peres; tribu de Manasés
vocabinfos._zh_tw_Definition:
利金 或利堅 或利肯 这个字在希伯來文的意思是 "雜色"
陽性專有名詞 人名
1) 米甸的五個國王之一, 為以色列人所弒
2) 希伯崙的四個兒子之一, 沙買的父親(代上 2:43-44)
3) 瑪拿西人, 瑪吉與他的妻子瑪迦所生的兒子(代上 7:16)
專有名詞 地名
4) 在便雅憫的一個城; 地點不詳 #書 18:27|
vocabinfos._zh_Definition:
利金 或利坚 或利肯 这个字在希伯来文的意思是 "杂色"
阳性专有名词 人名
1) 米甸的五个国王之一, 为以色列人所弒
2) 希伯仑的四个儿子之一, 沙买的父亲(代上 2:43-44)
3) 玛拿西人, 玛吉与他的妻子玛迦所生的儿子(代上 7:16)
专有名词 地名
4) 在便雅悯的一个城; 地点不详 #书 18:27|

vocabinfos.mediumDef:
§ Rekem = "variegation"
n pr m This name is used for:
1) one of the 5 kings of Midian killed by the Israelites
2) one of the 4 sons of Hebron and the father of Shammai
3) a Manassite, son of Machir by Maachah his wife
n pr loc
4) a town in Benjamin; site unknown

A man of the tribe of Judah living at the time of Divided Monarchy, first mentioned at 1Ch.2.43;
son of: Hebron (H2275I);
brother of: Korah (H7141J), Tappuah (H8599A) and Shema (H8087);
father of: Shammai (H8060H)
§ Rekem = "variegation"
n pr m 1) one of the 5 kings of Midian killed by the Israelites
2) one of the 4 sons of Hebron and the father of Shammai
3) a Manassite, son of Machir by Maachah his wife
n pr loc
4) a town in Benjamin; site unknown

A man of the tribe of Manasseh living at the time of Divided Monarchy, only mentioned at 1Ch.7.16;
son of: Sheresh (H8329);
brother of: Ulam (H0198)
§ Rekem = "variegation"
n pr m 1) one of the 5 kings of Midian killed by the Israelites
2) one of the 4 sons of Hebron and the father of Shammai
3) a Manassite, son of Machir by Maachah his wife
n pr loc
4) a town in Benjamin; site unknown
